channel.title: Why is this yell not working

item.title: Why is this yell not working
item.dc:creator: @Paintball199 Paintball199
item.description:
@Paintball199 wrote:

if(command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5)
{
if(playerIsMember == 1)
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[Member]: "+playerName+ ":  "+command.substring(5)+"";
} else {
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = ""+playerName+ ":  "+command.substring(5)+"";
}
}

Lmao.

item.title: Why is this yell not working
item.dc:creator: @musicmad441 Musicmad
item.description:
@musicmad441 wrote:

Hi, here is my yell code:

[code]else if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5)
{
if(playerIsMember == 1)
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[Member: "+playerName+ “: “+command.substring(5)+”]”;

		String title = "";
		switch(playerRights)
		{

			case 0:
				break;
			case 1:
				title = "[Moderator]";
				break;
			case 2:
				title = "[Administrator]";
				break;
			case 3:
				title = "[Owner]";
				break;
		}
		PlayerHandler.messageToAll = title + " " + playerName + ": " + command.substring(5);
	}[/code]

I want all the other strings to work, but I also want it to say if you are a member or not, it compiles successfully, but when I go on a member account, it just does the normal yell not the member yell.

How do I fix this?

Thanks

Musicmad
